page.title: 15CHILHAM PILGRIM'S FAYRE
page.content: The Pilgrim's Fayre is a special occasion held in May each year in Chilham.Lots of people come to watch and perform.There is lots of entertainment,such as singing and May pole dancing and there are lots of different stalls.In the centre of the square,there is a stage where many different acts are shown like the country strings,singing,dancing and bands.Drinks and food are supplied at the school,and there is also a Punch and Judy show.In the church a group called "The Chanters" perform.They are accompanied by the Church organ.The Pilgrim's Fayre attracts many tourists and local people.The villagers hope that the Fayre will make a lot of money for the running of the recreation ground.
